fixes.name: Selected Year Filter
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced YEAR([TransactionDate]) with YEAR('accounts+'[TransactionDate]) to use table-qualified column. Replaced the Tableau parameter reference [Parameters].[Select Year] with SELECTEDVALUE('Select Year'[Display As]) per parameter mapping rules. The expression returns a boolean and is implemented as a measure because it references a parameter.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
